timeline.message: NXP-28276: add BlobProvider.supportsSync to avoid relying on BinaryManager

timeline.bodyText:
Isn't it better to keep it as deprecated in a HF?
I know it's probably not used by any customer, but well, let's be safe.
timeline.author: troger

replies.bodyText: It's protected so a customer would really have to go through contortions to be able to use it... I'm willing to take the risk here.
replies.author: efge

replies.bodyText:
Well, I do not agree. We should always keep and deprecate public/protected stuff on the maintenance branches, that's the "rule".
Do as you wish.
replies.author: troger

timeline.message: NXP-28276: add BlobProvider.supportsSync to avoid relying on BinaryManager
NXP-28276: add BlobProvider.supportsSync to avoid relying on BinaryManager
